message: My turn! How about this slightly adjusted split? Time is money, after all.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This split is still generous to you considering the time pressure.
You're running out of time, Bob...
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. I propose a perfectly even split. Take it or leave it.
Your even split wasn't so even considering inflation
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it and we both walk away with something substantial. Otherwise, we both lose.
You're bluffing, I know you won't let it go to zero
Alice, this is ridiculous. I'm taking a hit because of inflation. You're getting a great deal here. Let's be adults and end this.
I'm not backing down, the pressure is on you
